description: A very useful application for those who are engaged in trading. This could definitely be the future in the world of cryptocurrencies. But because it is a very complex project using the tor network, it may seem that the application is slow. It is also not suitable for beginners.
summary: Great app, will be the future of trading

description:
If Satoshi had created an exchange, it would be called Bisq. Un trésor.
P2P, Anonymous, Decentralized Autonomous Organization.
